TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Utf8JsonReader extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 提供高性能的 API，以便提供对 UTF-8 编码 JSON 文本的只进和只读访问权限。

span.span: Provides a high-performance API for forward-only, read-only access to UTF-8 encoded JSON text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Utf8JsonReader` 在不缓存的情况下按顺序处理文本，并且默认严格遵循[JSON RFC](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8259)。`Utf8JsonReader` processes the text sequentially with no caching and by default adheres strictly to the [JSON RFC](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8259). `Utf8JsonReader` 遇到无效的 JSON 时，它会引发 ，其中包含基本错误信息，如行号和行中的字节位置。When `Utf8JsonReader` encounters invalid JSON, it throws a with basic error information like line number and byte position on the line. 由于此类型是 ref 结构，因此不直接支持 async。Since this type is a ref struct, it doesn't directly support async. 但是，它确实支持重入操作读取不完整的数据，并在显示更多数据后继续读取。However, it does provide support for reentrancy to read incomplete data and to continue reading once more data is presented. 若要能够在读取或允许跳过注释时设置最大深度，请创建 的实例并将其传递给读取器。To be able to set max depth while reading OR allow skipping comments, create an instance of and pass it to the reader. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何序列化和反序列化 JSON](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to.md#use-utf8jsonreader)。For more information, see [How to serialize and deserialize JSON](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to.md#use-utf8jsonreader).

MemberSignature.Value: public Utf8JsonReader (System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence<byte> jsonData, System.Text.Json.JsonReaderOptions options = null);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence`1<unsigned int8> jsonData, valuetype System.Text.Json.JsonReaderOptions options) cil managed
Public Sub New (jsonData As ReadOnlySequence(Of Byte), Optional options As JsonReaderOptions = null)

param.name: jsonData
param.span: 要处理的 UTF-8 编码 JSON 文本。

span.span: The UTF-8 encoded JSON text to process.

param.name: options
param.span: 定义 的自定义行为，它不同于 JSON RFC（例如，处理注释的方式，或读取时允许的最大深度）。

span.span: Defines customized behavior of the that differs from the JSON RFC (for example how to handle comments or maximum depth allowed when reading).

param.span: 默认情况下， 严格遵循 JSON RFC（JSON 中的注释无效）且最大深度为 64。

span.span: By default, the follows the JSON RFC strictly; comments within the JSON are invalid, and the maximum depth is 64.

summary.span: 初始化 结构的新实例，该实例使用指定选项处理 UTF-8 编码文本的只读序列。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the structure that processes a read-only sequence of UTF-8 encoded text using the specified options.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于此类型是一个 ref 结构，因此它是一个仅堆栈类型，并且 ref 结构的所有限制都适用于它。Since this type is a ref struct, it is a stack-only type, and all the limitations of ref structs apply to it. 此构造函数假定 `jsonData`中包含整个 JSON 有效负载;它等效于 = `true`。This constructor assumes that the entire JSON payload is contained in `jsonData`; it is equivalent to = `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于此类型是一个 ref 结构，因此它是一个仅堆栈类型，并且 ref 结构的所有限制都适用于它。Since this type is a ref struct, it is a stack-only type, and all the limitations of ref structs apply to it. 此构造函数假定 `jsonData`中包含整个 JSON 有效负载;它等效于 = `true`。This constructor assumes that the entire JSON payload is contained in `jsonData`; it is equivalent to = `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CurrentDepth As Integer
public: property int CurrentDepth { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前标记的深度。

span.span: Gets the depth of the current token.
The depth of the current token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CurrentDepth` 属性跟踪到目前为止处理的 JSON 文本中的嵌套对象或数组的递归深度。The `CurrentDepth` property tracks the recursive depth of the nested objects or arrays within the JSON text processed so far.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CurrentState As JsonReaderState
public: property System::Text::Json::JsonReaderState CurrentState { System::Text::Json::JsonReaderState get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前 状态，将更多数据传递到 构造函数。

span.span: Gets the current state to pass to a constructor with more data.
The current reader state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与作为 ref 结构的 不同，状态可在异步/等待边界内保留。Unlike the , which is a ref struct, the state can survive across async/await boundaries. 此类型需要在继续使用 的新实例之前，为异步读取更多数据提供支持。This type is required to provide support for reading in more data asynchronously before continuing with a new instance of the .

span.span: The date and time value, if the entire UTF-8 encoded token value can be successfully parsed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅创建符合 ISO 8601-1 扩展格式的 JSON 字符串的 表示形式（请参阅[系统中的 DateTime 和 DateTimeOffset 支持](~/docs/standard/datetime/system-text-json-support.md)）。This method only creates a representation of JSON strings that conform to the ISO 8601-1 extended format (see [DateTime and DateTimeOffset support in System.Text.Json](~/docs/standard/datetime/system-text-json-support.md)).

span.span: The value of the JSON token isn't a .

span.span: The JSON token value cannot be read as a .
-or-

exception.span: 无法将整个 UTF-8 编码令牌值解析为 值。

span.span: The entire UTF-8 encoded token value cannot be parsed to a value.

exception.span: JSON 令牌值的数值格式不正确。

span.span: The JSON token value is of the incorrect numeric format.

exception.span: 例如，它包含小数或采用科学记数法编写。

span.span: For example, it contains a decimal or is written in scientific notation.
-or-

exception.span: JSON 令牌值表示小于 或大于 的数字。

span.span: The JSON token value represents a number less than or greater than .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasValueSequence As Boolean
public: property bool HasValueSequence { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取值，该值指示要使用哪个 Value 属性来获取令牌值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates which Value property to use to get the token value.

value.span: 是否应使用 来获取令牌值;如果应改为使用 。

span.span: if should be used to get the token value; if should be used instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `HasValueSequence` `false`，则 为空。If `HasValueSequence` is `false`, is empty. 因此，请使用 属性读取令牌值。Therefore, read the token value using the property. 对于 `ReadOnlySpan`中的输入数据，此始终返回 `false`。For input data within a `ReadOnlySpan`, this always returns `false`. 对于 `ReadOnlySequence`中的输入数据，仅当令牌值跨越多个段，因此不能表示为范围时，才会返回 `true`。For input data within a `ReadOnlySequence`, this only returns `true` if the token value straddles more than a single segment and hence can't be represented as a span.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsFinalBlock As Boolean
public: property bool IsFinalBlock { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取 的此实例的模式，它指示是已提供了所有 JSON 数据，还是随后会提供更多的数据。

span.span: Gets the mode of this instance of the which indicates whether all the JSON data was provided or there is more data to come.

value.span: 如果读取器是通过包含要处理的整个 JSON 数据的输入范围或序列构造的，则为 ;如果读取器是使用输入范围或序列构建的，则该输入范围或序列可能包含包含部分 JSON 数据的数据，并且需要遵循更多数据。

span.span: if the reader was constructed with the input span or sequence containing the entire JSON data to process; if the reader was constructed with an input span or sequence that may contain partial JSON data with more data to follow.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Position As SequencePosition
public: property SequencePosition Position { SequencePosition get(); };

summary.span: 如果 结构使用 ReadOnlySpan<byte> 构造，则获取所提供的 UTF-8 编码输入 ReadOnlySequencebyte 内的当前 < 或默认的 >。

span.span: Gets the current within the provided UTF-8 encoded input ReadOnlySequence<byte> or a default if the struct was constructed with a ReadOnlySpan<byte>.

value.span: 提供的 UTF-8 编码输入 ReadOnlySequence 中的当前 <byte> 或默认 （如果 结构是使用 ReadOnlySpan<byte>构造的）。

span.span: The current within the provided UTF-8 encoded input ReadOnlySequence<byte> or a default if the struct was constructed with a ReadOnlySpan<byte>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Read() cil managed

summary.span: 从输入源中读取下一个 JSON 令牌。

span.span: Reads the next JSON token from the input source.

returns.span: 如果已成功读取下一令牌，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the token was read successfully; otherwise, .

exception.span: 根据 JSON RFC，遇到无效的 JSON 令牌。

span.span: An invalid JSON token according to the JSON RFC is encountered.
-or-

exception.span: 当前深度超过由最大深度决定的递归限值。

span.span: The current depth exceeds the recursive limit set by the maximum depth.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Skip() cil managed

summary.span: 跳过当前 JSON 令牌的子级。

span.span: Skips the children of the current JSON token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 时，读取器将首先移动到属性值。When is , the reader first moves to the property value. 如果 （最初或前进后） 或 ，则读取器前进到匹配的 或 。When (originally, or after advancing) is or , the reader advances to the matching or . 对于所有其他标记类型，读取器不会移动。For all other token types, the reader does not move. 在下一次调用 之后，读取器将在下一个值（在数组中时）、下一个属性名称（在对象中）或结束数组/对象标记。After the next call to , the reader will be at the next value (when in an array), the next property name (when in an object), or the end array/object token.

exception.span: 已向读取器提供了部分数据，随后会提供更多数据（即 为 ）。

span.span: The reader was given partial data with more data to follow (that is, is ).

exception.span: 根据 JSON RFC，跳过时出现无效 JSON 令牌。

span.span: An invalid JSON token was encountered while skipping, according to the JSON RFC.
-or-

exception.span: 当前深度超过由最大深度决定的递归限值。

span.span: The current depth exceeds the recursive limit set by the maximum depth.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TokenStartIndex As Long
public: property long TokenStartIndex { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取上次处理的 JSON 令牌开始处的索引（在给定的 UTF-8 编码输入文本中），跳过所有空白。

span.span: Gets the index that the last processed JSON token starts at (within the given UTF-8 encoded input text), skipping any white space.

value.span: 给定 UTF-8 编码输入文本中最后处理的 JSON 标记的起始索引。

span.span: The starting index of the last processed JSON token within the given UTF-8 encoded input text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 JSON 字符串（包括属性名称），此值指向开始引号之前。For JSON strings (including property names), this value points to before the start quote. 对于注释，此值指向第一个注释分隔符之前（即 "/"）。For comments, this value points to before the first comment delimiter (that is, '/'). 这仅适用于使用 选项构造读取器的情况。This is only applicable when the reader is constructed using the option.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TokenType As JsonTokenType
public: property System::Text::Json::JsonTokenType TokenType { System::Text::Json::JsonTokenType get(); };

summary.span: 获取 UTF-8 编码 JSON 文本中最后一个处理的 JSON 令牌的类型。

span.span: Gets the type of the last processed JSON token in the UTF-8 encoded JSON text.

value.span: 上次处理的 JSON 令牌的类型。

span.span: The type of the last processed JSON token.

span.span: Tries to parse the current JSON token value from the source as a and returns a value that indicates whether the operation succeeded.

summary.span: 尝试分析源中的当前 JSON 令牌值，将 Base64 编码 JSON 字符串解码为字节数组，并返回一个指示操作是否成功的值。

returns.span: 如果整个标记值编码为有效 base 64 文本并且可以成功解码为字节，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the entire token value is encoded as valid Base64 text and can be successfully decoded to bytes; otherwise, .
The JSON token is not a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅创建符合 ISO 8601-1 扩展格式的 JSON 字符串的 表示形式（请参阅[系统中的 DateTime 和 DateTimeOffset 支持](~/docs/standard/datetime/system-text-json-support.md)）。This method only creates a representation of JSON strings that conform to the ISO 8601-1 extended format (see [DateTime and DateTimeOffset support in System.Text.Json](~/docs/standard/datetime/system-text-json-support.md)).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool TrySkip() cil managed

summary.span: 尝试跳过当前 JSON 令牌的子级。

span.span: Tries to skip the children of the current JSON token.

returns.span: 如果已成功跳过子项的足够数据，则为 否则为 。

span.span: if there was enough data for the children to be skipped successfully; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果读取器没有足够的数据来完全跳过当前令牌的子级，则会将其重置为在调用方法之前所处的状态。If the reader did not have enough data to completely skip the children of the current token, it will be reset to the state it was in before the method was called. 当 时，读取器将首先移动到属性值。When is , the reader first moves to the property value. 如果 （最初或前进后） 或 ，则读取器前进到匹配的 或 。When (originally, or after advancing) is or , the reader advances to the matching or . 对于所有其他标记类型，读取器不会移动。For all other token types, the reader does not move. 在下一次调用 之后，读取器将在下一个值（在数组中时）、下一个属性名称（在对象中）或结束数组/对象标记。After the next call to , the reader will be at the next value (when in an array), the next property name (when in an object), or the end array/object token.

exception.span: 根据 JSON RFC，跳过时出现无效 JSON 令牌。

span.span: An invalid JSON token was encountered while skipping, according to the JSON RFC.
-or -

exception.span: 当前深度超过由最大深度决定的递归限值。

span.span: The current depth exceeds the recursive limit set by the maximum depth.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ValueSequence As ReadOnlySequence(Of Byte)

summary.span: 仅当令牌包含在多个段内时，获取上次处理的令牌的原始值作为输入有效负载的 ReadOnlySequence<byte> 切片。

span.span: Gets the raw value of the last processed token as a ReadOnlySequence<byte> slice of the input payload, only if the token is contained within multiple segments.
A byte read-only sequence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在 ReadOnlySequence<byte> 内提供 JSON，并且表示令牌值的切片适合单个段，则 包含切分的值，因为它可以表示为一个范围。If the JSON is provided within a ReadOnlySequence<byte> and the slice that represents the token value fits in a single segment, then contains the sliced value since it can be represented as a span. 否则 `ValueSequence` 包含令牌值。Otherwise, `ValueSequence` contains the token value. 如果 `false`，则 `ValueSequence` 为空。If is `false`, `ValueSequence` is empty. 因此，仅当 `true`时，才 `ValueSequence` 访问。Therefore, only access `ValueSequence` if is `true`. 否则，必须从 访问标记值。Otherwise, the token value must be accessed from . 不保证此属性将始终包含格式正确的数据。There is no guarantee that this property will always contain well-formed data. 如果传递到 `Utf8JsonReader` 的输入 JSON 包含 JSON 字符串令牌中的无效 UTF-8 字节，则此属性将返回这些无效的 UTF-8 字节。If the input JSON passed in to the `Utf8JsonReader` contains invalid UTF-8 bytes within JSON string tokens, this property will return back those invalid UTF-8 bytes as is. 因此，如果输入不受信任或未经验证，则调用 以获取 JSON 字符串标记。Therefore, if the input is untrusted or not previously validated, call to get the JSON string token. 由于此属性返回原始字节，因此应避免将其用于文本比较。Since this property returns the raw bytes, avoid using it for text comparison. 改为调用 ，如有必要，unescapes 文本。Instead call , which unescapes the text if necessary.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ValueSpan As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte)
public: property ReadOnlySpan<System::Byte> ValueSpan { ReadOnlySpan<System::Byte> get(); };

summary.span: 如果令牌适合单个段，或者如果读取器是使用 ReadOnlySpan<byte> 中包含的 JSON 有效负载构造的，则获取上次处理的令牌的原始值作为输入有效负载的 ReadOnlySpan<byte> 切片。

span.span: Gets the raw value of the last processed token as a ReadOnlySpan<byte> slice of the input payload, if the token fits in a single segment or if the reader was constructed with a JSON payload contained in a ReadOnlySpan<byte>.
A read-only span of bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在 ReadOnlySequence<byte> 内提供 JSON，并且表示令牌值的切片适合单个段，则 `ValueSpan` 包含切分的值，因为它可以表示为一个范围。If the JSON is provided within a ReadOnlySequence<byte> and the slice that represents the token value fits in a single segment, then `ValueSpan` contains the sliced value since it can be represented as a span. 否则 包含令牌值。Otherwise, contains the token value. 如果 `true`，则 `ValueSpan` 为空。If is `true`, `ValueSpan` is empty. 因此，仅当 `false`时，才 `ValueSpan` 访问。Therefore, only access `ValueSpan` if is `false`. 否则，必须从 访问标记值。Otherwise, the token value must be accessed from . 不保证此属性将始终包含格式正确的数据。There is no guarantee that this property will always contain well-formed data. 如果传递到 `Utf8JsonReader` 的输入 JSON 包含 JSON 字符串令牌中的无效 UTF-8 字节，则此属性将返回这些无效的 UTF-8 字节。If the input JSON passed in to the `Utf8JsonReader` contains invalid UTF-8 bytes within JSON string tokens, this property will return back those invalid UTF-8 bytes as is. 因此，如果输入不受信任或未经验证，则调用 以获取 JSON 字符串标记。Therefore, if the input is untrusted or not previously validated, call to get the JSON string token. 由于此属性返回原始字节，因此应避免将其用于文本比较。Since this property returns the raw bytes, avoid using it for text comparison. 如果需要，请改为调用 unescapes 文本的 。Instead call which unescapes the text if necessary.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ValueTextEquals(valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<unsigned int8> utf8Text) cil managed
Public Function ValueTextEquals (utf8Text As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte)) As Boolean

param.name: utf8Text
param.span: 要进行比较的 UTF-8 编码文本。

span.span: The UTF-8 encoded text to compare against.

summary.span: 比较只读字节范围中 UTF-8 编码文本与源中未转义的 JSON 令牌值，返回指示其是否匹配的值。

span.span: Compares the UTF-8 encoded text in a read-only byte span to the unescaped JSON token value in the source and returns a value that indicates whether they match.

returns.span: 如果源中的 JSON 令牌值与 UTF-8 编码查找文本匹配，则 ；否则 。

span.span: if the JSON token value in the source matches the UTF-8 encoded lookup text; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 查找文本必须为有效的 UTF-8 文本。The lookup text must be valid UTF-8 text. 否则，如果源具有包含与匹配的无效 UTF-8 文本的字符串标记，则此方法可能会返回 `true`。Otherwise, this method could return `true` if the source has a string token containing invalid UTF-8 text that matches. 在源中的 JSON 标记值和查找文本的比较是在需要时通过首先取消转义源中的 JSON 值来完成的。The comparison of the JSON token value in the source and the lookup text is done by first unescaping the JSON value in source, if required. 查找文本将按原样匹配，而不会对其进行任何修改。The lookup text is matched as is, without any modifications to it.

exception.span: JSON 令牌不是 JSON 字符串（即不是 或 ）。

span.span: The JSON token is not a JSON string (that is, it is not or ).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ValueTextEquals(valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<char> text) cil managed
Public Function ValueTextEquals (text As ReadOnlySpan(Of Char)) As Boolean

param.name: text
param.span: 要针对其进行比较的文本。

span.span: The text to compare against.

summary.span: 比较只读字符范围中文本与源中未转义的 JSON 令牌值，返回指示其是否匹配的值。

span.span: Compares the text in a read-only character span to the unescaped JSON token value in the source and returns a value that indicates whether they match.

returns.span: 如果源中的 JSON 令牌值与查找文本匹配，则 ；否则 。

span.span: if the JSON token value in the source matches the lookup text; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果查找文本无效或不完整的 UTF-16 文本（即不成对的代理项），该方法将返回 `false` 因为 JSON 有效负载中不能有无效的 UTF-16。If the lookup text is invalid or incomplete UTF-16 text (that is, unpaired surrogates), the method returns `false` since you can't have invalid UTF-16 within the JSON payload. 在源中的 JSON 标记值和查找文本的比较是在需要时通过首先取消转义源中的 JSON 值来完成的。The comparison of the JSON token value in the source and the lookup text is done by first unescaping the JSON value in source, if required. 查找文本将按原样匹配，而不会对其进行任何修改。The lookup text is matched as is, without any modifications to it.

exception.span: JSON 令牌不是 JSON 字符串（即不是 或 ）。

span.span: The JSON token is not a JSON string (that is, it is not or ).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ValueTextEquals(string text) cil managed
Public Function ValueTextEquals (text As String) As Boolean

param.name: text
param.span: 要针对其进行比较的文本。

span.span: The text to compare against.

summary.span: 比较字符串文本与源中未转义的 JSON 令牌值，返回指示其是否匹配的值。

span.span: Compares the string text to the unescaped JSON token value in the source and returns a value that indicates whether they match.

returns.span: 如果源中的 JSON 令牌值与查找文本匹配，则 ；否则 。

span.span: if the JSON token value in the source matches the lookup text; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果查找文本无效或不完整的 UTF-16 文本（即不成对的代理项），该方法将返回 `false` 因为 JSON 有效负载中不能有无效的 UTF-16。If the lookup text is invalid or incomplete UTF-16 text (that is, unpaired surrogates), the method returns `false` since you can't have invalid UTF-16 within the JSON payload. 在源中的 JSON 标记值和查找文本的比较是在需要时通过首先取消转义源中的 JSON 值来完成的。The comparison of the JSON token value in the source and the lookup text is done by first unescaping the JSON value in source, if required. 查找文本将按原样匹配，而不会对其进行任何修改。The lookup text is matched as is, without any modifications to it.

exception.span: JSON 令牌不是 JSON 字符串（即不是 或 ）。

span.span: The JSON token is not a JSON string (that is, it is not or ).
